name: Hyperspace Jump
description:
Pilot a space freight ship through hyperspace! Try to reach your destination as quickly as you can while dodging asteroids and space debris.

Controls:

Up, left, down, right movement = W, A, S, D or arrow keys

Hyperdrive throttle setting = 1 , 2, 3, 4

Start and restart = space bar

Quit = escape key

(I guess I could have also called it "Speeding is Dangerous in Space Too" but idk lol)
